subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Stéphane Goubert retired this autumn after a 16-year career in which he never won a bike race on his own. Yet in some ways he deserves to be rider of the year.
snippet: Stéphane Goubert retired this autumn after a 16-year career in which he never won a bike race on his own. Yet in some ways he deserves to be rider of the year.
